title: Komodo Dragons: Giant Reptiles
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 234 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 450L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Q and X
description: Komodo dragons are more than just the largest lizards in the world. Komodo Dragons: Giant Reptiles goes into detail about their habitat, hunting habits, and how their offspring survive. Interesting images support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
